Name: Encounter: The Blob
Description:
Before the game begins, put Blob onto the field.
At any time, if there is no enemy named Blob on the field, you win the game.
After you draw a hero card from the encounter deck, remove 1 damage from each Blob, discard that hero card, and it escalates.

Name: Blob
Description:
This enemy gets +X üó°Ô∏è, where X half is the number of Blobs on the field, rounded down.
This enemy gets +X ‚ù§Ô∏è, where X is 40 divided by the number of Blobs on the field, rounded down.
As this leaves the field, evenly redistribute its damage among each other Blob, removing the remainder.
You can't blank this enemy's effects.

Name: Swallow Whole
Description:
Shuffle each hero card on your field into the encounter deck.
If no cards were shuffled into the encounter deck this way, this event persists and escalates.

Name: Regurgitate
Description:
If there are no copies on the field, this event persists and escalates.
Otherwise, put each copy on top of the encounter deck one at a time in a random order. Then, this event escalates X times, where X is one plus the number of copies placed onto the encounter deck this way.

Name: Absorb
Description:
Shuffle each hero card on your partner's field into the encounter deck. 
If no hero cards were shuffled into the encounter deck this way, this event escalates.
This event persists.

Name: Incorporate
Description:
If there are no non-elite enemies on the field, this event persists and escalates.
Otherwise, turn each non-elite enemy into a copy of Blob. Evenly redistribute the damage on Blobs among each Blob, removing the remainder.

Name: Sticky Coating
Description:
After you draw this duration, if there is another duration named Sticky Coating on the field, put 6 ‚è≥ on that duration and discard this one.
After you play an action that deals damage to The Blob, shuffle it into the encounter deck.

Name: Stinging Slime
Description:
After you draw a hero card from the encounter deck, lose 1 vitality.
As time passes, shuffle the top card of your hero deck into the encounter deck.

Name: Mitosis
Description: Turn the top X cards of the encounter deck and/or discard pile into copies of Blob, where X is the number of Blobs on the field. Evenly redistribute the damage on Blobs among each Blob, removing the remainder.
